javax.realtime
Class HeapMemory

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.realtime.MemoryArea
        |
        +--javax.realtime.HeapMemory
public final class HeapMemory
extends MemoryArea

The HeapMemory class is a singleton object that allows logic within other scoped memory allocate objects in the Java heap.
